title: Learning Collaborative Updates
description: RADx-UP Kansas Learning Collaborative materials available for viewing and download.
cleaned_text: Learning Collaborative Updates This page shares information with the Learning Collaborative communities to enhance their COVID-19 testing efforts. Information may include, but is not limited to, innovative testing strategies or programs currently available in Kansas, helpful tips for collaborative partnerships, and ways other Learning Collaborative communities have disseminated both testing and vaccination messages. [CTO v Volunteer Testing Program](https://apps.kumc.edu/radxup/CTO%20v%20Volunteer%20Testing%20Program.pdf)(PDF) [Integrating testing Tracking](https://apps.kumc.edu/radxup/Optimizing%20CRL%20Test%20Kit%20Utilization%20and%20Tracking.pdf)(PDF) [Partnering with on Covid Prevention](https://apps.kumc.edu/radxup/Partnering%20with%20Businesses%20on%20Covid%20Prevention.pdf)(PDF) [Planning COVID Town Halls](https://apps.kumc.edu/radxup/Planning%20Covid%20Town%20Halls.pdf)(PDF) Learning Collaborative Meeting Files: [Vaccine Strategic Communication Guide July 6, 2021](https://apps.kumc.edu/radxup/Vaccine%20Strategic%20Communication%20Guide.docx)(Word) [Vaccine Safety Key Points July 6, 2021](https://apps.kumc.edu/radxup/Vaccine%20Safety%20Key%20Points.pdf)(PDF) [Vaccine Communication Scenarios July 6, 2021](https://apps.kumc.edu/radxup/Vaccine%20Communication%20Scenarios.docx)(Word) [Delta in the Driver's Seat Presented by Dr. LeMaster on July 20, 2021](https://apps.kumc.edu/radxup/Delta%20in%20the%20drivers%20seat.pdf)(PDF) [K-12 Testing Options Presented by Dr. Duvwe on July 20, 2021](https://apps.kumc.edu/radxup/K-12%20Testing%20Options.pdf)(PDF) [School Testing Funding Presented by Sarah Allin of KDHE on August 17, 2021](https://apps.kumc.edu/radxup/ELCFundingFactSheet.pdf)(PDF) [Setting Goals to Increase Testing Excel Table](https://apps.kumc.edu/radxup/Setting%20Goals%20to%20Increase%20Testing%20Target%20-Excel%20Table%20in%20the%20Video.xlsx)(Excel) [Childhood COVID risks Presented by Dr. Ellerbeck on August 17, 2021](https://apps.kumc.edu/radxup/Childhood%20COVID%20risks.pdf)(PDF) [Setting Goals to Increase Testing Target Presented by Dr. Yvonnes Chen on August 3, 2021](https://youtu.be/4zD2WYLQQCY?rel=0)(YouTube) [RADxUP Presents: Business COVID Symptoms,](https://youtu.be/SCg9c9ZNjuQ)March 2022 (YouTube)
